about.heading: Why me
about.description: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? Highlight your motivation for professional growth and continuous learning. Emphasise your strong problem-solving skills and passion for coding.

project_1.title: Join
project_1.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

project_2.title: Zeitplaner
project_2.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

project_3.title: Pollo Loco
project_3.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco also to defeat against the crazy hen.

testimonials.heading: Need a teamplayer? Here is what my colleagues said about me

t1.name: Bhuwan
t1.quote: Thierno had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. He is a reliable and friendly person.

t2.name: Idrissa Bah
t2.quote: He is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.

t3.name: James Rugman
t3.quote: He is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.
